com.boxcast.android

Class BoxCastClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boxcast.android.BoxCastClient

  • public class BoxCastClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to make remote calls to the BoxCast API endpoint.

    • Method Summary

      • getLiveBroadcasts

        public void getLiveBroadcasts(java.lang.String channelId,
                              BoxCastCallback<BroadcastList> callback)
        Gets the live broadcasts for a channel.
        Parameters:
        channelId - The channel id to list broadcasts from.
        callback - The callback to be called when finished loading the broadcasts.

        callback - The callback to be called when finished loading the broadcasts.

                             BoxCastCallback<BroadcastView> callback)
        Gets a view into a broadcast.
        Parameters:
        broadcastId - The broadcast id.
